featured.text: For the same reason, raisins and crackers are not the best choice.
The name of their rowboat was “Crackers.”

definition.zh_def: 一種脆的餅乾，通常用作小吃或配料。
definition.en_def: A crisp, dry baked food typically eaten as a snack or used as a topping.
definition.example: She enjoyed her soup with a few saltine crackers.
